name: 6.15 "Tale of Two Cities" Quiz | 'Cheers'- Season 6 | 10 Questions

questions.text: Who did Woody say the twins looked like?
questions.explanation:
each other.

	Carla named the twins Jesse and Elvis. They were named after Elvis Presley and his twin brother who died at birth.

questions.text: What did Anthony get for his mother?
questions.explanation:
5 bucks.

	Anthony asked Sam to borrow 5 bucks to get something for his mom since she just had the twins. When Sam asked him what he was going to get his mom, Anthony replied "5 bucks".

questions.text: Why did Rebecca think Evan had her hire a waitress?
questions.correct: He was sleeping with the woman.
options: He was just helping some out of work lady get a job.
It was a friend of the family.
questions.explanation:
He was sleeping with the woman.

	Rebecca was in love with Evan Drake. Consequentially, any other woman who appeared in his space made her jealous.

questions.text: Who else worked at Cheers, just for tips?
questions.explanation:
Annie.

	Anthony had lost his job so Annie asked if she could work at Cheers while Carla was out. Sam said yes, but when Rebecca said she already hired someone else Annie agreed to work just for tips.

questions.text: How long had Anthony and Annie been together as of this episode?
questions.explanation:
28 months.

	Annie said that she "gave Anthony the best 28 months of her life" They were fighting because Anthony lost his job.

Laurie.

	Laurie was played by Bobbie Eakes. She has appeared in various soap operas including "All My Children".

questions.text: When Sam is 60, how old did he say Annie would be?
questions.explanation:
22.

	Then he said "That can't be right". He also said she'd be looking really good then and should call him when he's 60.

questions.text: Where did Anthony get a job?
questions.explanation:
Burger, Burger, Burger.

	Anthony got hired as the assistant night manager. He said "When I tell people to chop lettuce, they ask, how high?"

questions.text: Who did the woman Rebecca hit turn out to be?
questions.explanation:
Evan's daughter.

	She told Evan that she had some sort of problem where she randomly hits people. Evan said he didn't want to shake her hand until she took her medication.

Sam.

	Showing Evan that she had this hitting problem, Rebecca hit Sam and caused his bloody nose. When Sam complained about it, Rebecca called him "a big baby".
